verses.roman:
pūrvavat prabhu kailā sabāra milana
strī-saba dūra ha-ite kailā prabhura daraśana

synonyms: pūrva-vat—as previously; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kailā—performed; sabāra milana—meeting everyone; strī—women; saba—all; dūra ha-ite—from a distance; kailā—performed; prabhura daraśana—seeing the Lord.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu received them all, just as He had in previous years. The women, however, saw the Lord from a distance.
